body:
Earlier today, there was a huge argument between a lot of Avicus members and some staff members, and I was one the members involved.
I know that it was wrong to continue my argument about the ban, and I did not want to imply that some staff members are not doing their job properly, because I know that they are.
I really hope that you will not hold any grudges against me, but I understand if you will remain mad, because I know that what I did was wrong.

I am especially sorry to :

-NolanDalton
-EmeraldSword85
-Mooch24
-Princezz_Dubstep
-The_Detonator_
-cole1crc

And any other members who were involved in this issue.
I hope that you understand that I meant no offence to any of you, and I hope that you do not lose any respect towards me.
Thank you,
-Porky.

title: I'm Very Sorry.

replies.body: Iz ok porky you will always be my favourite mlgporky who has ever been on avicus XD but it's ok even doe I wasent dere

replies.body: It's okay! We all make mistakes, I'm glad you owned up to them! It's all good! :D We all just needed to get it out of the way!

replies.body: Really isn't a problem xP You were just stating your opinion on the matter.
